EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Montgomery Reception_Q114.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Pivotal Invitation - Tuesday, March 3rd
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Pivotal Event! Tuesday, March 4th 6:30pm - 8:30pm
Pivotal Labs 631 Wilshire Boulevard Santa Monica, CA 90401 You are cordially invited to join CEO Paul Maritz for a exclusive tour of Pivotal Labs, followed by a whiskey-tasting and coffee-sipping reception. We look forward to welcoming customers and friends to enjoy some local hospitality with the talented Pivots in our LA home. Join us to hear more about the bright future on Pivotal's horizon as we approach our first birthday.
Come share in the conversation and cheer! Please RSVP to sbeyer@gopivotal.com <mailto:sbeyer@gopivotal.com> or egansen@gopivotal.com <mailto:egansen@gopivotal.com> to let us know you will attend.
